title: Help choosing a font management tool
content:
My fonts are out of control. I'm A CS5 user and I've tried a couple font management tools and found them to be odious to set up or that they did crazy stuff to the font lists in CS programs.

Anybody using a font manager (windows) that they love and that plays nice with Adobe CS
author: friendtodogs

comments.content:
Unrelated: I love your logo!

hhp
There are three serious Windows font management programs: Suitcase Fusion (our product, which is the most popular); FontAgent Pro; and FontExplorer X.
Font Agent Pro refuses to recognize font names that start with numbers. Given how hard it is to come up with a unique font name these days, this certainly is a major problem for this application.
